entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
